content:
本件保存七年
C2-62-
1572
MEMO
May 18, 2
To
: Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AID/C
From
: C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division Original signed by
C. C. Chang
Subject
: Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX (99-471)
Reference is made to the attached Reports of Excess Equipment and copy of JGWhite letter dated May 11, 1962 File Ref. MSA- 33.4.
In the above letter, JGWhite recommended that wire rope, pump and motor, cranes, booms, block, X-Ray apparatus, breaker, presses, bench, hoists, testers, drilling, torches, gun, spray guns, vises, cleaner, aligner, cabinets, adapter, calculating machines, jacks, dividers and caliper micrometers be procured. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
Encl. Reports Copy of JGWhite letter
cc:
